blogPost.excerpt: Record videos from the camera or capture from the screen. Free screen and camera recorder. Capture unlimited videos. Available for Mac, Windows, Chrome and Edge browsers. More than 1 million individuals share billions of screen recordings using Scre.io
blogPost.body: Record videos from the camera or capture from the screen. Free screen and camera recorder. Capture unlimited videos. Available for Mac, Windows, Chrome and Edge browsers. More than 1 million individuals share billions of screen recordings using Scre.io
blogPost.title: Scre.io - Record videos from the camera or capture from the screen
blogPost.author: Luan Gjokaj

localize.description: 从相机录制视频或从屏幕上捕捉。免费的屏幕和相机记录器。捕捉无限的视频。适用于Mac、Windows、Chrome和Edge浏览器。超过100万个人使用Scre.io分享数十亿次屏幕录像。
localize.tagline: 从相机中录制视频或从屏幕上捕捉视频

localize.description: 從相機錄製視頻或從屏幕上捕捉。免費的屏幕和相機記錄器。捕捉無限的視頻。適用於Mac、Windows、Chrome和Edge瀏覽器。超過100萬個人使用Scre.io分享數十億次屏幕錄像。
localize.tagline: 從相機中錄製視頻或從屏幕上捕捉視頻

previous.excerpt: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
previous.title: Airdocs - Generate documents from Airtable

localize.description: Airdocs 是 Airtable 的文档生成服务。从您的数据中创建智能、美观的文档。拖放式设计器让您可以对文档进行终极控制。将您的文档发送到另一个应用程序或将它们存储回 Airtable 中。
Airdocs 是 Airtable 的文檔生成服務。從您的數據中創建智能、美觀的文檔。拖放式設計器讓您可以對文檔進行終極控制。將您的文檔發送到另一個應用程序或將它們存儲回 Airtable 中。

next.excerpt: Surveys are broken, so we used video + audio to reimagine them. 💬 Reach out via SMS 📱Customers record video right in their web browser 📊 Transcriptions, sentiment, and emotion to make sense of videos at scale 🚀Capture authentic customer videos and reviews
next.title: Intercept - Reimagine customer feedback using video and audio surveys

localize.description: 调查问卷是破碎的，所以我们用视频+音频的方式来重新想象。💬通过短信联系客户📱客户在他们的网络浏览器中直接录制视频 📊转录、情感和情绪，以使视频在规模上变得有意义 🚀捕捉真实的客户视频和评论。
localize.tagline: 使用视频和音频调查重塑客户反馈。

localize.description: 調查問卷是破碎的，所以我們用視頻+音頻的方式來重新想象。💬通過短信聯繫客戶📱客戶在他們的網絡瀏覽器中直接錄製視頻 📊轉錄、情感和情緒，以使視頻在規模上變得有意義 🚀捕捉真實的客戶視頻和評論。
localize.tagline: 使用視頻和音頻調查重塑客戶反饋。
